name: James Kerr
text: Delicious food and great service!  The waitress was fantastic and took great care of us the whole time we were there.  Everything we ate was prepared perfectly.  Best meal I've had at Pizza Hut in a long time.  Thank you!!

name: Rachel Morgan
text: Excellent service. We ordered the Super Supreme. Very tasty! Will visit again when in lovely Havana! Recommend.

name: Ruthie Knox
text: Excellent food.. and service!

name: Brice Beecher
text: Good quality and good price. Make sure you ask if they have any specials or rebates

name: barfyspitz
text: I went here for lunch with my family and we all had the buffet. It was fairly busy and there was not a large selection on the left. So waiting on our waitress who was more interested in telling customers about her financial problems, ‚Ä¶More

name: Angela LiCalzi
text: This was very good. The waiter Adam I believe was his name, was very friendly and even helped us save some money. The food was fresh and hot üëå. Keep up the great work! Thank you. I wish there was more sit down pizza huts.

name: Josh Sisson
text: Great pizza! Super friendly staff and excellent service for my large family gathering on a busy Friday night! Amazing experience.

name: Shannon Fangmeier
text: Great service and pizza.

name: Mark Ferguson
text: Yummy food and good service at a reasonable price.

name: Sandra Giddings
text: We had chicken wings and pizza and salad bar everything was yummy. Highly recommend.

name: Dick Brown
text: 15 minutes produced a warm pizza of our choice, 3 cool beverages and a quick supper (30 minutes) and back on the road. Waitress & Hut atmosphere very hospitable. Will definitely repeat business.

name: Meagan Sieg
text: Not enough sauce on the pizza, even if you order extra sauce. Staff can use some training in customer service.

name: Rudie White
text: Love it 40 years best pizza ever.

name: Stephanie Bump
text: Great pizza. The salad buffet left a lot to be desired though, only the bare minimum was available. Service was fast and friendly. Dining area was clean.

name: Michael Sears
text: I visited this Pizza Hut with friends after church.  Our waitress was FANTASTIC!  She was anticipating our needs before we asked.  I took one star off because the the pizza buffet was a little light in choices but what was there was typical ‚Ä¶More

name: Lora Welbourne
text: Great food . The best pizza around supper friendly staff . Highly recommend this Pizza hut.

name: Mindy Kruzan
text: Food was great and the waiter we had (Nathan Frakes) was awesome.

name: Angie Dyer
text: We enjoyed pizza, pasta, and wings for dinner!  Everything was delicious.  We had so much food that we had doggie bags to bring home with us.  Staff was friendly and knowledgeable.  We will return in the future!

name: jamie scott
text: Pretty nice place to eat noce people! I will eat there again when comen threw here!

name: Jon Brown
text: Always great food and a friendly staff.

name: Local Consumer
text: Good food, kind service and competitive prices. A step above most Pizza Huts and some pizzarias. Also not bad on cleanliness but could improve a little.

name: Martin Mcatee
text: We had salad bar wings and pizza all were very good excellent waitress and all staff were very attentive

text: The Pizza Hut in Havana is the best Pizza Hut in our area. Beardstown Pizza Hut is dirty, the food was bad, and the prices were higher than the prices in Havana.

name: Ken Dye
text: We like to go on Wednesday evening as they have the best buffet. They also have warm chocolate chip cookies on dessert bar.

name: Ross Canyon
text: This Pizza Hut was in Havana IL. We were Passing through. Great job Havana Pizza Hut. Staff was great. Food was very good.

name: Lucas Men
text: The only thing about this pizza hut that I don't like is they don't deliver. But the service is always great here and the crew does what they can to make your time and meal there enjoyable.
